title: Inside Astana-Qazaqstan’s Plan to Make Tour de France History With Mark Cavendish
content:
'There’s only one true target for 2024': Cavendish's winning trainer is back with the Manxman and plotting victory number 35 already.

Read the full article at Inside Astana-Qazaqstan’s Plan to Make Tour de France History With Mark Cavendish on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
